summary: This document details the resignation of Richard Kahn as Trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, effective December 31, 2017. The resignation is acknowledged by Jeffrey E. Epstein, who is identified as the Grantor, along with other trustees involved in the trust.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn resigns as Trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, effective December 31, 2017.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is acknowledged as the Grantor of The 2013 Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika Kellerhals is acknowledged as a Trustee in the resignation document.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is mentioned as the Successor Trustee in the resignation of Richard Kahn.

connections.description: Richard Kahn resigns as Trustee of the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Erika Kellerhals acknowledges the resignation of Richard Kahn as Trustee.
Bella Klein is named as the Successor Trustee following Richard Kahn's resignation.

events.title: Resignation of Trustee
events.description: Richard Kahn resigns as Trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, effective on this date.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn resigns as Trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust effective December 31, 2017.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the Grantor of the trust.
Erika Kellerhals and Bella Klein are acknowledged as trustees involved in the trust.
